name: leads-finder
title: ✨ Leads Finder — Effortless B2B Data Extraction
description: Cost-effective alternative to ZoomInfo, Lusha & Apollo. Get verified B2B emails, LinkedIn profiles, and rich firmographics at scale. Generate targeted contact lists using advanced filters (job title, location, industry, tech stack, revenue, funding) and export verified emails, LinkedIn URLs, and detailed company data ready for CRM or outreach.
